-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


@package docbuilder
@version 0.1.0


-- | Build documentation and put it in /docs |
module System.Docbuilder

-- | Top level of document generation
buildTheDocsRules :: Rules ()

-- | All Paths are the base path versions
data NamesThatMustBeDiscovered
NamesThatMustBeDiscovered :: FilePath -> FilePath -> FilePath -> String -> NamesThatMustBeDiscovered
[buildTarget] :: NamesThatMustBeDiscovered -> FilePath
[cabalPath] :: NamesThatMustBeDiscovered -> FilePath
[ltsPath] :: NamesThatMustBeDiscovered -> FilePath
[packageName] :: NamesThatMustBeDiscovered -> String
data GeneratedStaticRules
GeneratedStaticRules :: [FilePath] -> [Rules ()] -> GeneratedStaticRules
[generatedWants] :: GeneratedStaticRules -> [FilePath]
[generatedRules] :: GeneratedStaticRules -> [Rules ()]
instance GHC.Classes.Eq System.Docbuilder.DocbuilderErrors
instance GHC.Show.Show System.Docbuilder.DocbuilderErrors
instance GHC.Classes.Ord System.Docbuilder.NamesThatMustBeDiscovered
instance GHC.Show.Show System.Docbuilder.NamesThatMustBeDiscovered
instance GHC.Classes.Eq System.Docbuilder.NamesThatMustBeDiscovered
